### getRegisterInfo() {#a71901f22ddcb8f9bdfea7ef41b595457}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const ARMRegisterInfo &amp; llvm::ARMInstrInfo::getRegisterInfo () const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
getRegisterInfo - <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetinstrinfo">TargetInstrInfo</a> is a superset of MRegister info.

As such, whenever a client has an instance of instruction info, it should always be able to get register info as well (through this method).

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/arminstrinfo-h/#l00038">38</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/arminstrinfo-h">ARMInstrInfo.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
